thread.title: EX-NMP CALVIN CHENG CALLS FOR CIVIL SERVANT'S HEADS AFTER MISTAKEN CULLING OF ENDANGERED RED JUNGLEFOWL
thread.title_full: EX-NMP CALVIN CHENG CALLS FOR CIVIL SERVANT'S HEADS AFTER MISTAKEN CULLING OF ENDANGERED RED JUNGLEFOWL

author: farhan
title: EX-NMP CALVIN CHENG CALLS FOR CIVIL SERVANT'S HEADS AFTER MISTAKEN CULLING OF ENDANGERED RED JUNGLEFOWL
text:
EX-NMP CALVIN CHENG CALLS FOR CIVIL SERVANT'S HEADS AFTER MISTAKEN CULLING OF ENDANGERED RED JUNGLEFOWL   Advertisement 
<Credits: Calvin Cheng> 
I think the authorities may have culled endangered red jungle fowl by mistake. The videos, pictures submitted by residents all show red junglefowl. There was a documentary on the Sin Ming red junglefowl. 
Common sense tells us that a desk bound white collar civil servant isn't going to go catch chickens and kill them. The contractor they hired probably can't tell the difference between a junglefowl and a chicken. Somebody needs to be held responsible. Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
